title: Diamond III OCE Streamer - IGN Kiraze
body:
I stream quite often and put a lot detail into my descriptions. Advice and pointers is not uncommon in my stream (past broadcasts for your reference). Feel free to {{summoner:2}}  me out, even a little {{item:2050}} will suffice. If you enjoy my stream, please don't hesitate to be upgrade yourself into a {{item:2045}}. I am sometimes on my twitch chat when I don't stream so feel free to chill on my page if you wish. Anyway! Happy face everyone...happy face.

I'm working on a facebook page and twitter page to post all my times as to when I will be streaming. Just recently did today and I am now DIAMOND 2 WOOHOO. Feel free to drop to keep updated on the RP giveaway that I will be handing out soon. 

Additional Info about me:
Currently sitting on no.1 spot for best {{champion:133}} Quinn in OCE and placed no.18 in the World http://www.lolskill.net/champion/quinn/toplistScore

Might as well check me out whilst I'm offline.
Youtube page: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCYUEzpBs6RPl7fL1Kog5h7Q
OR watch my past broadcasts on http://twitch.tv/kirazeness

replies.body: Apologies for those who have followed me this weekend and haven't got to actually seeing my stream go live. My router has been half dead and I have been experiencing bad internet speeds such that it was impossible to even get my stream to go live. Anyway, hope the lot of you get to see my stream in the next few days. Happy face.

Oohoo I might check it out. I'm not a big fan of dubstep but some actually sound really decent. Anyway I ain't streaming for the next few days but be sure to follow to get notified when I play. You can unfollow {{summoner:6}}  me anytime if I'm not worthy of your presence.

airaze was this guy on the forums ages ago
then he changed his name to Strider Hiryu

then he quit LoL

> [{quoted}](name=MageBlades,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=yNeaWNap,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-03-08T07:33:56.121+0000)
>
> airaze was this guy on the forums ages ago
> then he changed his name to Strider Hiryu
> 
> then he quit LoL

Oh, I don't know him so I'm 99% original. Gotta consider the safety factor {{item:3026}}  for those people who have the same name. We are after all on the Internet XD.

> [{quoted}](name=Kiraze,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=yNeaWNap,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-03-08T07:39:20.525+0000)
>
> Oh, I don't know him so I'm 99% original. Gotta consider the safety factor {{item:3026}}  for those people who have the same name. We are after all on the Internet XD.

ally he’s not with LoL anymore, he’s moving on to produce dubstep under that name though :P

> [{quoted}](name=MageBlades,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=yNeaWNap,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-03-08T05:24:47.241+0000)
>
> Kiraze sounds like airaze...
> 
> loominarty??

What's airaze? Anyway it's actually pronounced crazy. Decided on the name when I began streaming. I'm bad with names xD
